paragraphs.name: b941
paragraphs.text: More importantly, does it matter to me?

And give yourself permission to suck in the beginning. Don’t beat yourself and stress over your imperfections. Nobody is perfect. But guess what, the real world rewards those who get stuff done. Those who choose to show up. Those who launch. Those who have the courage to start. And those who choose to create.
Start with something you can do today or this week, even if you can commit a few minites to it. And tomorrow, do it again. Maybe for a few more minutes. And so on.

Thomas, I have a book here on Medium titled Viable, it hails from a different approach and concern but some of the elements and outcomes could be in line with what you encourage. Perhaps if the mindset of man changed we would all live more productive and fulfilled lives. Thanks again

content.subtitle: “Pursue” is a strong and meaningful word. To pursue is to go after something that means everything to you. If you pursue an activity…

paragraphs.name: fab2
paragraphs.text: Give Yourself Something to Pursue. Even if You Fail, The World is Better off With You Having Tried

paragraphs.name: 9b60
paragraphs.text: Thanks for sharing this. The process of starting something new and unfamiliar is always tough because you can’t predict the outcome. That’s what scares people, including myself. “The world is better off with you having tried,” is a great way to put it. Nice post, Thomas!

b25b3c7454e.title: I have realized it is so important to create something because that will give me sense of self…

paragraphs.name: e5ba
paragraphs.text: I have realized it is so important to create something because that will give me sense of self satisfaction and self respect that I didn’t just consume and then ceased. Trying hard to create something. It is not easy to take time out after 10 hours job, travel and sacrificing family time but I and my family won’t regret this process for sure. My kids are excited watching me try :)

f584837e38c.title: I love the quote that recites “You do not need permission”.

paragraphs.name: e917
paragraphs.text: I love the quote that recites “You do not need permission”. That is so true. Pain is a great propeller for making you stop caring about the consequences of your choices. If you are suffering, suddenly all your fears and worries seem so meaningless; because no failure can make you suffer as much as you are right now. Discover today how accomplishment can follow pain.

paragraphs.name: 1d65
paragraphs.text: very well explained and written .

af64180eff51.title: It’s very encouraging to see an article that talks about trying again, even after you fail.

paragraphs.name: 0f43
paragraphs.text: It’s very encouraging to see an article that talks about trying again, even after you fail. I think it is something that can’t be avoided but we shouldn’t be afraid of it. Good read!
